text: I set it up just like you have and your code worked fine for me. I just turned on the repeater and defaulted to 5 cards and added in the icon and image and switched back and forth to test.
Thank you for that! It's so weird because that got me thinking and I went to swap out the image, and then it worked... It's weird that the image didn't show up by default
Hi everyone have an odd issue here. Something seems to taking up space on the right side of the whole site when I look on mobile. Any ideas.
Sure I have it in staging right now let me move it somewhere I can share with you.

I have noticed a bug in the latest chrome update - where every now and then my whole page will shift to the left for no reason. The only way to fix it is to open the page in a new tab. But ive noticed it on a handful of sites that I  and my team have worked on in the past week. Very odd. I would try that to rule that nonsense out before pulling hair out over a browser bug.

<@UQWGKUEN7> That sounds like what it is doing but it has a slight wobble also. <@U02NJACH5QS> <http://452923.hs-sites.com/testing> And it wobbles a little bit even when using HubSpot mobile viewport.
Also verified issues in Safari also as far as the slight wobble.
Looks like itâ€™s your slick slider
Thank you. How were you able to figure out which one? I tried everything even applying a red border around everything.
not really understanding the context of what you are doing. Do you have some more information?
